pathAssistantSteps.info:
For this record you need to make sure that :

  • all the K.Y.C. documents are provided by the merchant
  • Those documents are uploaded in the Back Office, and ticked if well uploaded in the Merchant's Profile: Meaning you can't update them Manually.
  • every contractual document has been signed by the merchant
  • have sent the Quality Survey
  • a Referent Champion is assigned
